They are dedicated to ‘for profit’ and 'non-profit' companies equally. Currently, their customer base of HHSM users is about 50/50 between non-profit ILC companies and for-profit personal care services businesses.  They have stayed true to their commitments and remain completely dedicated to the in-home personal care services industry.  Since 2005, their growth has averaged approximately 80% annually.
